attributes.action: The First Amendment wasn't designed to protect acceptable speech, rather unacceptable speech. BAN DEAD BABY JOKES & IMAGES, INVOLVE AUTHORITY'S!
attributes.additional_details:
Dead Baby Joke Pages On Facebook.
They post photos of dead babies, talk about sexually abusing babies, used threats to kill or maim, used methods of stalking harassment, defamation of others personal characters and been slanderous to a child abuse sexual level.
Characteristics of these people have shown great concern for mental health well-being, family’s are at risk.
Under the freedom of information act we have the right to be disclosed information on subjects, sexual-offenders,paedophiles, etc..
This does not interfere with the first amendment
‘Sec. 1104. Cyber-threat-intelligence-and-information-sharing.’
Malicious-Communications-Act-1998
Protection-from-Harassment-Act-1997
Action needs to be taken now. IP addresses are logged within Facebook login system database,
It’s about time you invoke full Identification on all accounts & only people with photo I.D. such as a passport, driving licence, or proofs
of address can enter to Facebook. Limiting one account per person!

rejection.details: This is an issue for Facebook.
